attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: max
attributes.desc: max number tags that can be enter

attributes.name: tag-type
attributes.desc: tag type

attributes.name: tag-effect
attributes.desc: tag effect

attributes.name: trigger
attributes.desc: the key to trigger input tag

attributes.name: draggable
attributes.desc: whether tags can be dragged

attributes.name: delimiter
attributes.desc: add a tag when a delimiter is matched(2.9.9)

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: input box size

attributes.name: collapse-tags
attributes.desc: whether to collapse tags to a text when multiple selecting(2.11.0)

attributes.name: collapse-tags-tooltip
attributes.desc: whether show all selected tags when mouse hover text of collapse-tags. To use this, collapse-tags must be true(2.11.0)

attributes.name: save-on-blur
attributes.desc: whether to save the input value when the input loses focus(2.9.7)

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.desc: whether to show clear button

attributes.name: clear-icon
attributes.desc: custom clear icon component(2.11.0)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether to disable input-tag

attributes.name: validate-event
attributes.desc: whether to trigger form validation

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.desc: same as readonly in native input

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.desc: same as autofocus in native input

attributes.name: id
attributes.desc: same as id in native input

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.desc: same as tabindex in native input

attributes.name: max-collapse-tags
attributes.desc: the max tags number to be shown. To use this, collapse-tags must be true(2.11.0)

attributes.name: maxlength
attributes.desc: same as maxlength in native input

attributes.name: minlength
attributes.desc: same as minlength in native input

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder of input

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.desc: same as autocomplete in native input

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.desc: native aria-label attribute(a11y)

events.name: @input
events.desc: triggers when the input value change

events.name: @add-tag
events.desc: triggers when a tag is added

events.name: @remove-tag
events.desc: triggers when a tag is removed

events.name: @drag-tag
events.desc: triggers when a tag is dragged(2.11.3)
events.param: Function(oldIndex: number, newIndex: number, value: string) => void

events.name: @clear
events.desc: triggers when the clear icon is clicked
